job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with business, architects and demand and project managers to understand company needs and devise possible AI / model based solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding business needs and translating them into potential technical solutions, which aligns with the definition of Business Understanding & Strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Build scalable AI solutions in a cloud environment (Databricks) using python and Apache spark.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the core task of building and deploying software solutions, specifically in a cloud environment, which falls under Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop projects through proof-of-concept, pilot and full deployment phases.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase outlines the software development lifecycle from ideation to deployment, a key aspect of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Further develop the AI components in our data platform to improve our technical infrastructure, standards of working and tool stack.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves enhancing existing software components and infrastructure, which is a core responsibility within Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate the final model with other aspects of the application; design and control how they communicate with one another (REST APIs, database queries, etc..).
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of models into larger applications and managing their communication, a clear indicator of Software Development & Integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Communicate results and ideas to key stakeholders; explain complex use cases at an appropriate level for the audience using effective data visualization techniques.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions communicating results and explaining complex concepts to stakeholders, which is a direct match for Communication & Collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment with new ideas, technologies and data to stay posted on the latest developments and identify new use cases to leverage them.
job_tasks.justification: While experimentation is mentioned, the context of leveraging new technologies and data for use cases, coupled with the overall software development focus, places this under the broader umbrella of Software Development & Integration, as it's about improving the technical offering.

soft_skills.phrase: Communicate results and ideas to key stakeholders; explain complex use cases at an appropriate level for the audience using effective data visualization techniques.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly relates to communicating technical information to various audiences, fitting the definition of Communication & Collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with business, architects and demand and project managers to understand company needs and devise possible AI / model based solutions.
soft_skills.justification: This task involves understanding business needs and devising solutions, which falls under Business Understanding & Strategy.

soft_skills.phrase: Experiment with new ideas, technologies and data to stay posted on the latest developments and identify new use cases to leverage them.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase highlights the need to stay updated with new technologies and explore new use cases, which aligns with Learning & Adaptability.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks such as building scalable solutions in a cloud environment, developing projects through deployment phases, improving technical infrastructure, and integrating models via APIs. While AI/model-based solutions are mentioned, the core responsibilities are focused on the engineering and integration aspects rather than deep model development or specialization in Generative AI. The tasks primarily fall under Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering), with a clear focus on integrating AI components into a broader application context.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software engineering tasks and the integration of AI solutions. It's not a pure software engineering role, but the emphasis is on building and integrating rather than deep AI research or model creation. The profile assignment is straightforward based on the task distribution. A slightly lower score is given because the term 'AI' is used broadly, and it's not explicitly stated if the focus is on traditional ML or GenAI, though the tasks lean towards integration.
